snippet.title: Brigador: Up-Armored Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for Brigador: Up-Armored Edition, originally posted June 2, 2017.

Pilot a mech to hunt down and destroy the oppressive government of a cyberpunk autocracy. In this fast-paced, top-down-shooter, use overwhelming firepower to destroy columns of tanks and level buildings.

Song is "A New Age" by Makeup And Vanity Set.

Brigador is a trademark of Stellar Jockeys. All rights reserved.

Find out more at: https://stellarjockeys.com/games/brigador | @StellarJockeys

#Brigador #PCGaming #MechGame
